mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Feeds.YouTubeReader
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Turns a list of YouTube links into a playlist or a gallery
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Implemented as an XSLT function. Allows you to control the RSS source and number of items to display through its parameters. RSS feeds are not cached.
